Title: Relates to access to multiple dwelling units for campaigning and registering voters
Summary: Establishes the right of access to multiple dwelling units and other multiple unit facilities used as a residence, by candidates for elected office and their volunteers for campaigning or registering voters; allows owners or managers of facilities to require identification, set reasonable hours for access, require advance notice and limit the numbers of volunteers allowed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to access to multiple unit dwellings by candidates and volunteers for the purpose of campaigning or registering voters
